title: Giro d’Italia Stage 11: Richard Carapaz Wins Big with Searing Attack, Isaac del Toro Widens Lead after Break Stalls
content:
The 2019 pink jersey Carapaz pounced on the closing climb to surprise the GC favorites to win the stage and revive his overall ambitions: 'I saw people were suffering.'

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Stage 11: Richard Carapaz Wins Big with Searing Attack, Isaac del Toro Widens Lead after Break Stalls on Velo.
